ValidationRule.description: Whenever Family Income Source -> Others then Mandatory to complete 'Other Family Income Source' Field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( INCLUDES( Family__c , "Other") , ISBLANK( Other_Family_Income_Sources__c ) )&& (!$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c ||(LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all" && LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Specify Other Family Income Sources.
